articles.title: Worker-Peasant Red Guards, Powerful Militia of WPK
articles.content:
Worker-Peasant Red Guards, Powerful Militia of WPK
						
Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- 55 years have passed since the founding of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, a powerful militia of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Worker-Peasant Red Guards, founded by President Kim Il Sung on Jan. 14, Juche 48 (1959), is a non-standing military force. It plays the role of the Korean People's Army's wing, which is to defend the home front in cooperation with the KPA or independently from the enemy's attack in the event of emergency while conducting socialist construction in peacetime.
					
					 The Red Guards, involving workers, peasants, working intellectuals and all other civilians, has performed admirable feats in socialist construction and defence of the country and in the showdown with the U.S.-led imperialists.
					
					 Deeply aware of the truth that the country should be defended with arms, the civilians of the DPRK have striven to grasp the idea of giving priority to arms and the Juche-based war tactics of the WPK and improve their marksmanship under the slogan of "Rifle in one hand and hammer or sickle in the other!", though they have been busy with production and construction. They, together with the KPA, smashed the enemies' every move for a war, laying solid foundations for building a thriving nation during the Arduous March, the forced march.
					
					 The Worker-Peasant Red Guards developed into invincible force commanded by leader Kim Jong Il with strong military discipline. Its might was clearly displayed through the military parades celebrating the 60th, 63rd and 65th anniversaries of the DPRK and on other occasions.
					
					 It is now growing stronger as a Juche-based militia under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: WPRG Is Revolutionary Armed Forces: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
WPRG Is Revolutionary Armed Forces: Rodong Sinmun
						
Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday carries an editorial to mark the 55th anniversary of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards (WPRG).
					 The WPRG is revolutionary armed forces faithfully upholding the revolutionary cause of the Workers' Party of Korea and the powerful forces for defending the country and building socialist construction, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The People's Army stands in the forefront for defending the leader unto death and the WPRG in the flanks and depth. 
					
					 If anyone dares hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and has an axe to grind, he can never evade merciless punishment by the WPRG.
					
					 All the WPRG members are dynamically advancing toward the road of independence, Songun and socialism indicated by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, bearing in mind the validity and invincibility of the idea and cause of the DPRK as the immutable faith. They are reliably defending their provinces, counties and lands with ever-victorious military tactics and bold capacity for a real war.
					
					 It is the greatest pride of Songun Korea to have the revolutionary militia forces devotedly defending the cause of the party and the leader and demonstrating its might as the powerful militant ranks to defend the country and build a thriving country.
					
					 All the WPRG members should discharge their honorable mission and duty as revolutionary armed forces of the party in the efforts to defend the country and build a thriving nation with the invincible faith and ardent patriotism.

articles.title: Stamp Marks Anniversary of Militia in DPRK
articles.content:
Stamp Marks Anniversary of Militia in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued a new stamp in commemoration of the 55th anniversary of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards (WPRG).
					 The stamp shows members of the Guards who are replete with the will to thoroughly implement the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on putting all the people under arms and turning the whole country into a fortress.
					
					 The WPRG, founded on January 14, Juche 48 (1959) under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung, is a voluntary military organization of working people.
					
					 It serves as revolutionary armed forces of the WPK whose mission is to defend with arms the Party and the leader and the gains of the revolution from the enemies' infringement.
					
					 The Bureau also brought out six stamps featuring vegetables and fruits.

articles.title: Anniversary of People's Palace of Culture Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of People's Palace of Culture Marked
						
Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The People's Palace of Culture marked its 40th anniversary.
					 It, associated with the great feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, is an important place of ideological and cultural life of the Korean people.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung gave field guidance to it 77 times after its establishment and gave important teachings which would serve as guidelines in operating it.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made sure that the palace named by the President serve as a base for cultural life of the Korean people, including youth, in name and reality, and sent modern equipment to it. He showed its employees deep trust and love, providing field guidance 44 times.
					
					 Over the past 40 years since its foundation the palace has successfully carried out its mission under the wise leadership of the party and the leader.
					
					 A celebration meeting took place on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Ki Nam, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, officials concerned and officials and employees of the palace.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam read out a congratulatory message the WPK Central Committee sent to the workers, technicians and officials of the palace.
					
					 The WPK Central Committee in the message highly appreciated the workers, technicians and officials of the palace for devoting all their knowledge and energy to successfully carrying out the revolutionary tasks assigned by the party with boundless loyalty to the party and the leader and the spirit of devoted service for the people.

articles.title: Popular Sports Games Scheduled in DPRK
articles.content:
Popular Sports Games Scheduled in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Various popular sports events will take place in the DPRK this year.
					 Paektusan Prize Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions is to be held in January and badminton, swimming, tennis and table-tennis contests among officials from commissions, ministries and national institutions between April and November.
					
					 A national sports contest of provincial teams is scheduled in October.
					
					 The events also include:
					
					 The 10th National Sports Contest of Workers in August
					
					 National sports and amusement games of women's union officials and members in March
					
					 The 10th National Folk Sports Contest of Agricultural Workers in August
					
					 National student sports contest for September 5 Prize in August
					
					 National schoolchildren's sports contest in May-June
					
					 Sports contest of health workers in April-May
					
					 The 45th Sports Tournament of Artistes in October
					
					 National tournament of sports and football classes from secondary and primary schools in June-August

articles.title: Popular Healthcare System in DPRK
articles.content:
Popular Healthcare System in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address underscored the need for the public health sector to put efforts to medical treatment and preventive medicine for promoting the people's health, thus ensuring that the benefits of socialist healthcare system reach the people more closely.
					 The healthcare system of the DPRK is the most popular system as it is based on the Juche idea which regards man as the most precious being.
					
					 It is the best healthcare system in the world through which the state takes care of the people's health in a responsible manner.
					
					 Hospitals and other public health establishments can be seen everywhere to let the people enjoy free medical service.
					
					 From the mid-1960s, the country has given priority to preventive medicine along with treatment of diseases.
					
					 It has also paid big efforts to hygienic and anti-epidemic work, thus preventing occurrence of epidemic diseases in the country. 
					
					 The emergency anti-epidemic and hygienic information systems have been set up throughout the country.
					
					 The country's medical workers are now replete with firm determination to successfully carry out the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address, so as to give fullest play to the advantages of socialist free medical system.

articles.title: Economization Campaign Active in DPRK
articles.content:
Economization Campaign Active in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, said in his New Year Address that economizing is precisely production and a manifestation of patriotism.
					 In socialist society where popular masses are masters of everything, economization helps promote their wellbeing.
					
					 In capitalist society, production means and disposition of products are seized by a handful of capitalists and, therefore, most of the working masses have no interests in economization.
					
					 But, in socialist Korea, economizing gives benefits to both the collectives and individuals, as it bears directly upon the improvement of their livelihood and the prosperity of the country.
					
					 Economizing is closely related with the scientific development.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said in his New Year Address that a climate of attaching importance to science and technology should prevail across society, and all officials and working people should diligently learn modern science and technologyto make all people well versed in science and technology.
					
					 The workers of the Ryongsong Machine Complex are manufacturing state-of-the-art geothermal machines by their own efforts to make an effective use of heat with less consumption of electric power.
					
					 The economization campaign brisk in the DPRK will help consolidate the foundations of its self-reliant economy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Establishing Climate for Improved North-South Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Establishing Climate for Improved North-South Relations
						
Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- To establish a climate for improved inter-Korean relations is an urgent matter in the light of not only the desire of the fellow countrymen but also the requirement of the changed situation for achieving the reconciliation, unity, reunification and prosperity of the nation as soon as possible.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Now all compatriots in the north, the south and abroad are hoping for propelling the fresh progress in the efforts for national unity and the movement for national reunification through the improvement of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The north and the south have potentiality enough for solving their problems as desired by them and this has already been proved through the struggle waged in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 The priority issue essential in establishing a climate for improved inter-Korean relations is to put an end to slander, calumny and hostility among compatriots.
					
					 As long as the provocation and slander against the DPRK continue, it will never be possible to establish a favorable climate but only the confrontation and feud will continue. If they are allowed to go on, it will lead to a war between the north and the south in the end.
					
					 Consistent is the attitude of the DPRK towards the national reunification, a long-cherished desire of the nation, and the improvement of the inter-Korean relations. The DPRK will stand with anybody who loves the nation and wants reunification regardless of his or her past records and make positive efforts to establish a climate for improved inter-Korean relations this year, too.

articles.title: U.S. Is Biggest Threat to World: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Is Biggest Threat to World: Minju Joson
						
Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The results of the recent opinion poll conducted by the WIN/GALLUP International, the U.S., are drawing the attention of the world public.
					The opinion poll surveyed 68,000 people of 68 countries the most of whom answered it is the U.S., when asked which country poses the biggest threats to the global peace.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says this proves that the world no longer believes the U.S. depiction of itself as the "champion" of the global peace.
					
					 The U.S. has so far claimed that it has made efforts for global peace and stability but it is just hypocrisy and sophism to cover up its criminal nature, says the paper.
					
					 Wherever its troops set their foot, there occurred bloodshed by war, armed conflicts and such abnormal events as government change, tribal and ethnic conflicts and social chaos. This is a stark reality today.
					
					 The U.S. has been engrossed in military intervention in relevant regions and countries with its bases set up like a network around the world. It has a stockpile of the world's biggest nuclear weapons and is pursuing nuclear stand-off policy, threatening humankind with a nuclear war.
					
					 To take the Korean Peninsula, the world's biggest hotspot, as an example, the U.S. has deployed huge aggression troops and waged nuclear war drills to stifle the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 The U.S. is not a peace state but a rogue, police and war state which does not respect freedom and human rights. This is the unanimous assessment of the public.
					
					 It had better stop the cheap trick of deceiving the international public under the worn-out slogan of "peace".

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Confrontational Racket under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Confrontational Racket under Fire
						
Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- All Koreans and all other peoples of the world are expressing full support for the proposal of the DPRK to open a new phase for the independent reunification, peace and prosperity this year.
					 However, the south Korean puppet regime only responded to the proposal by making remarks threatening the security and peace of the nation and staging provocative war drills.
					
					 The south Korean defense minister said that the "north may employ the double-dealing tactics" in clear reference to the DPRK's call for establishing a climate for improved inter-Korean ties.
					
					 He gave the commanders and staff officers of the units at different levels such instructions as to be fully ready to cope with the "provocation" from the DPRK.
					
					 Not content with crying out for the "merciless retaliation", the chairman of the joint chiefs of staff of south Korea revealed his nature of confrontation maniac by stressing the need for soldiers to have active and offensive disposition before anything else.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive even called for "defending the northern limit line" to instigate the warlike forces to the military confrontation.
					
					 Senior officials of the regime shifted the blame for the deteriorated inter-Korean ties last year on to the DPRK and urged the "denuclearization of the north" while saying that peace and reconciliation can never be realized with words only.
					
					 Reckless war exercises to invade the DPRK have been staged in succession along the frontline from the outset of the New Year.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive held a New Year press conference in which she again took issue with the north over the "nuclear issue" and proposed the settlement of the nuclear issue and the international cooperation as what she called a measure for laying the foundation of unification.
					
					 The south Korean minister of Foreign Affairs held a confab with the U.S. defense secretary to reaffirm the stance of keeping increasing the military capabilities to maintain the joint defense posture, and discussed the plan to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Urges Park Geun Hye Regime to Step Down
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Urges Park Geun Hye Regime to Step Down
						
Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Korean scholar in the U.S. Sonu Hak Won made public an article titled "Undemocratic Park Geun Hye regime, step down" on January 2. 
					 The article said:
					
					 Park Geun Hye, who was elected through the illegal interference by power bodies including the Intelligence Service, is trampling down democracy while reviving "yusin" dictatorship. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities let "yusin" remnants hold important posts, resorting to undemocratic violence. 
					
					 They are fabricating conspiratorial cases while suppressing the progressive forces demanding an apology and probe into the illegal interference in the election. 
					
					 South Koreans from all walks of life are turning out in the candlelight actions in protest against the suppression by the present regime. They are launching vigorous actions such as meeting, demonstration and campaign for publishing declarations on the situation in demand of the resignation of Park Geun Hye. 
					
					 The undemocratic Park Geun Hye regime should be judged by the people without fail. 
					
					 Overseas Koreans, too, should wage a more vigorous struggle for forcing the present south Korean regime to step down.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Foreign Organizations
						
Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Switzerland, Thailand and Italy released statements in support of the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Jan. 1 positively supported his New Year Address, expressing conviction that the Korean people would raise a fierce wind of making a fresh leap forward on all fronts of building a thriving nation filled with confidence in victory.
					
					 The Thailand-Korea Friendship Association on the same day noted that Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address provided the Korean people and progressive mankind with a great banner instilling far-reaching ambition and firm conviction into them. 
					
					 Sincerely wishing him good health, the association hoped that the Korean people would register bigger successes in their efforts for stepping up economic construction and accomplishing the cause of national reunification this year.
					
					 The Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association said on Jan. 5 that this year marks the 20th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's last signature on a historic document concerning the country's reunification, expressing firm support for the President's idea on national reunification and the Korean people's struggle for it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Indian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Indian Political Party Leader
						
Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The general secretary of the Central Committee of the All-India Forward Bloc highly praised supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 He said when meeting the DPRK ambassador to India on Jan. 2:
					
					 First Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Un is identical to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in ideology, leadership and virtues.
					
					 Socialism in the DPRK is strong as it is led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He is deeply respected and liked by all people as he, possessed of warm humanity and noble outlook on the people, is pursuing the benevolent politics, all-embracing politics.
					
					 Their warm love and reverence for him is deeply impressing the international community.
					
					 The Korean People's Army has grown to be invincible and the WPK and the Korean people are firmly defending the country's sovereignty, dignity and socialist system as they are holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 We fully support his New Year Address.
					
					 The All-India Forward Bloc is convinced that all Koreans will open up a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity this year by adhering to the principle of independence specified in the three principles of national reunification and the north-south joint declarations, closely united in the idea of By Korean Nation Itself.
					
					 The Korean people will always emerge victorious as they are led by Kim Jong Un with iron-willed pluck, guts and superb commanding art.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Austria
						
Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Become Pillars Supporting a Prosperous Future Korea" was brought out in booklet by the Joseph Gebauer Publishing House in Vienna, Austria on January 7. 
					 Kim Jong Un made a congratulatory speech at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations on June 6, Juche 101 (2012) in celebration of the 66th anniversary of the KCU. He expressed his firm will to invariably carry forward the noble outlook of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the future and the rising generation. 
					
					 The work indicates the tasks and ways to bring up the KCU members to be reserves responsible for the future destiny of the country and the nation, equipped with knowledge, a good moral character and good health.

articles.title: Cumple 55 anos el Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino
articles.content:
Cumple 55 anos el Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino
						
Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ACNC) -- El Presidente Kim Il Sung fundo el 14 de enero del 48 (1959) de la Era Juche el Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino, poderosas fuerzas armadas civiles del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Estas fuerzas irregulares de nuevo tipo se dedican a la construccion del socialismo en el tiempo de paz y tienen la mision de defender la retaguardia desde la invasion enemiga en el tiempo de emergencia en cooperacion con el Ejercito Popular de Corea o independientemente.
					
					Integran ese cuerpo armado todos los segmentos de la poblacion como obreros, campesinos e intelectuales.
					
					Anteriormente, el EROC logro grandes proezas en la construccion socialista, la defensa de la patria y el enfrentamiento antiimperialista y antiyanqui.
					
					Consciente de su mision de defender con armas la RPDC, el pueblo coreano aprendio bajo la consigna combativa "!Con el fusil en una mano y la hoz o el martillo en la otra!" la idea militar y el autoctono metodo de combate del partido y el arte de tiro infalible impulsando simultaneamente la produccion y la construccion.
					
					Durante la pasada Marcha penosa, la forzada, frustro junto con el EPC las imprudentes tentativas de nueva guerra de los enemigos y sento la firme base de construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					En mas de medio siglo desde su fundacion, el EROC se ha convertido en invencibles filas de combate que han establecido el sistema de mando militar del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la disciplina militar revolucionaria.
					
					Su poderio ha sido comprobado en varias ocasiones, incluyendo los desfiles del EROC por el 60o, 63o y 65o aniversarios de la fundacion de la RPDC.
					
					Hoy dia, gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el cargo supremo de las fuerzas armadas, se abre la nueva era de prosperidad en la construccion de las fuerzas armadas civiles.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun celebra 55o aniversario de fundacion de EROC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun celebra 55o aniversario de fundacion de EROC
						
Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ACNC) -- En un editorial divulgado el dia 14 para conmemorar el 55o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino, Rodong Sinmun subraya que el EROC constituye las fuerzas armadas  revolucionarias que apoyan fielmente la causa revolucionaria del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y las poderosas fuerzas para la defensa de la patria y la construccion socialista.
					El Ejercito Popular de Corea se halla en el frente avanzado de la defensa a ultranza al lider, mientras el EROC esta en el flanco y el centro, adelanta el diario y continua:
					
					Si alguien atenta la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, no podra evitar el severo castigo del EROC.
					
					Todos los miembros del EROC avanzan por el camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo allanado por los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, al guardar profundamente como conviccion absoluta e invariable la justeza e invencibilidad de nuestra idea y causa.
					
					Con el invencible metodo, estrategia y capacidad de combate, defienden confiablemente sus provincias, sus distritos y sus tierras natales.
					
					El que cuenta con las fuerzas civiles revolucionarias que al defender a ultranza el partido, el lider y la causa, manifiestan el poderio de la fila de combate en defender la patria y construir una potencia prospera, deviene el gran honor y orgullo para la Corea del Songun.
					
					Todos los miembros del EROC con la invencible conviccion y el ardiente patriotismo deben cumplir satisfactoriamente la mision honrosa y el deber de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del partido en la defensa de la patria y la construccion de un Estado prospero.

articles.title: Palacio Cultural del Pueblo acoge 40o aniversario de su fundacion
articles.content:
Palacio Cultural del Pueblo acoge 40o aniversario de su fundacion
						
Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ACNC) -- El Palacio Cultural del Pueblo acogio el 40o aniversario de su fundacion.
					Esa base de vida cultural e ideologica del pueblo coreano fue visitada 77 veces por el Presidente Kim Il Sung que puso el nombre actual a ella.
					
					El Presidente hizo fundar el primero de enero del 63 (1974) de la Era Juche este palacio y dio instrucciones que sirvieron de guia en la gestion del palacio.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il tomo las medidas para que el palacio contribuyera a la vida cultural de los habitantes y jovenes, envio equipos modernos y lo visito 44 veces dispensando grandes benevolencias a los empleados.
					
					Durante 40 anos desde su fundacion, el palacio cumplio excelentemente su papel escribiendo sus anales orgullosos bajo la sabia orientacion del partido y el lider.
					
					Auspicio en el maximo nivel las reuniones historicas sesionadas con la presencia del Presidente y el Dirigente, los banquetes del Estado, las exhibiciones, las conferencias internacionales y los actos exteriores.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en el acto de informe por el 40o aniversario el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, los funcionarios de ramas interesadas y del palacio y los empleados.
					
					En la ocasion se dio lectura al mensaje de felicitacion del CC del PTC enviado a los obreros, tecnicos y funcionarios del palacio.
					
					El texto evaluo que los obreros, tecnicos y funcionarios del palacio vinieron cumpliendo con su tarea revolucionaria asignada por el partido trabajando con infinita fidelidad al partido y al lider y espiritu de servicio abnegado al pueblo.

articles.title: Competencias de deporte masivo programadas este ano
articles.content:
Competencias de deporte masivo programadas este ano
						
Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ACNC) -- Tendran lugar en el 103 (2014) de la Era Juche varios juegos de deportes masivos.
					Bajo la gran atencion de los aficionados al deporte, se efectuaran la competencia deportiva por el premio Paektusan de los funcionarios de los organos centrales (enero), los juegos de badminton (abril), la natacion (julio), el tenis (septiembre) y ping pong (noviembre) de los funcionarios de los comites, ministerios y organos centrales.
					
					Tendra lugar en octubre la competencia interprovincial nacional de deportes masivos que servira de buena oportunidad para levantar la ola deportiva en todo el pais.
					
					Estan programados tambien la 10a competencia deportiva nacional de obreros (agosto), la competencia deportiva y juego recreativo de las funcionarias e integrantes de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea (marzo), la 10a competencia nacional de deportes folkloricos de trabajadores agricolas (agosto), la universiada nacional por el Premio 5 de Septiembre (agosto) y el torneo deportivo nacional de jovenes y ninos escolares (mayo-junio).
					
					Por otra parte, se realizaran la competencia deportiva de rama de salud publica (hospitales) en abril y mayo, la 45a competencia deportiva de los artistas en octubre y la competencia nacional de alumnos de clases deportivas y grupos futbolisticos de las escuelas secundarias y primarias.
